sp_widget.name: About Us
sp_widget.template:
ABOUT US

Welcome to BookQuest Library System, your ultimate destination for accessing and managing a vast collection of books. We're dedicated to providing you with an efficient and user-friendly platform for discovering, borrowing, and enjoying a wide range of literary works.

We invite you to embark on your literary journey with BookQuest Library System. Explore our extensive catalog, access digital resources, participate in community events, and immerse yourself in the world of books like never before.

Happy reading!
The BookQuest Team

.about { padding: 2rem 0rem; } .upper, .lower { display: flex; flex-direction: row; justify-content: space-evenly; margin-bottom: 1rem; } .logo { display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; justify-content: center; } #logo { width: 70%; } .image { background-image: url(https://cdn.dribbble.com/users/696579/screenshots/5415942/drib_test_2.gif); background-size: cover; width: 36rem; height: 28rem; display: flex; align-items: center; border-radius: 50%; } .camp { position: relative; top: 2.6rem; left: 7.3rem; } #tent { width: 30%; } #fire { width: 15%; position: relative; top: 1rem; right: 1rem; } .info { width: 40%; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; text-align: center; padding: 0rem 2rem; border-radius: 10px; /* box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.35) 0px 5px 15px; */ } /* .info:hover{ transform: scale(1.1); } */ .info h1 { font-family: "Exo", sans-serif; font-size: 3rem; font-weight: black 900; margin-bottom: 0rem; } .head1 { text-decoration: white; } .info p { font-family: "Exo 2", sans-serif; font-size: 1.5rem; font-weight: bold; } .slider { display: flex; align-items: center; padding-top: 3.5rem; } .slider img { width: 36rem; height: 28rem; border-radius: 50%; } /* ------------------------------------ */ @media (max-width: 768px) { .upper { flex-direction: column; margin-bottom: 0rem; } #logo { width: 50%; } .image { width: 18rem; height: 14rem; } .camp { top: 1.2rem; left: 3rem; } .info { width: 85%; padding: 0rem 1.7rem; } .info h1 { font-size: 2rem; } .info p { font-size: 1rem;
